text: Amazing... I don't feel any discomfort at all...

The motif on the sleeves isn't tight, yet it's not falling
down at all. I wonder what's going on...

It seems like the issue I was concerned about
last time has been resolved.

Yes, indeed.
Professionals are truly amazing.

They understood my explanations,
even when I couldn't express myself clearly...

Haha, then you should make sure to express your
gratitude properly. It's part of being a professional.

I'll make sure to convey my thanks.
After all, I'm also a professional.

Yeah. But you know, this outcome also reflects the
effort you put into expressing your concerns.

Do you think so?
...But if that's true...

We'll have to keep that desire to
communicate alive from now on, won't we?
